column5: Develop your skills and creativity to masters level and engage in hands-on study of sustainable marketing practices relevant to the digital age. You'll cover aspects of marketing from branding to communications and innovation to logistics.Modern business is increasingly global - and we have designed a course to match. Our MSc International Marketing gives you the comprehensive knowledge, expertise and skills you need to build a successful career in international business and make a positive impact on the world around you.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
column9: 12-16 months full time, 2-3 years part time
